# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(str::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    lines = []
    for word in split(str)
        if length(" " * join(lines, " ")) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, "")
        end
        push!(lines, word)
    end
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

# Example usage:
println(wrap_string("Hello there this is a very long string that needs to be wrapped at 10 characters per line. Thank you for understanding."))
```
